text: @narendramodi @narendramodi ,@PMOIndia  @ArvindKejriwal : there is a need to have more security in Delhi. As the Covid-19 cases are rising rapidly, apart from lockdown, new unknown people selling goods, fruits, vegetables should be checked and verified before allowing them to sell.
